item.title: Great God Grove
item.description:
Title: Great God Grove
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: LimboLane
Publisher: LimboLane , Fellow Traveller
Franchise: Great God Grove
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game



Once in a generation, the gods come together to postpone the apocalypse. But this time, the god of communication started a bunch of godly fights and then went awol. With the sky splitting and the gods in disarray, who's gonna join the Bizzyboys to help SAVE DA WORLD FROM A-POCKY-LIPS???


As the gods’ mail-carrier, suck up and launch speech bubbles to solve puzzles.




Deliver messages to chat, flirt, or hurt their feelings.




The god of TEAMWORK? The god of LOVE SONGS? Drain it, who’s in charge around here…?

You may be ready for:

  • A big colorful world to explore
  • Third and first-person gameplay
  • Weird people. Weirder gods

But are you also ready for:

  • Godly crushes?
  • Pumpkin fights??
  • Puppets cooking???

AND YOU’RE NOT READY FOR:

  • Grovekeeping!
  • Godbossing!!
  • THE END OF THE WORLD AS WE KNOW IT!!!!!





LimboLane is a creative duo making silly games that squish and bounce, comprised of designer Day Lane and animator Yugo Limbo. They have a love for the kitschy, the surreal, and the utterly bizarre. Their nod-and-shake adventure game Smile For Me was self-published on Steam in 2019 and re-released for consoles in 2023.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 +
    • Processor: x64 architecture
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Tricky Madness
item.description:
Title: Tricky Madness
Genre: Racing , Simulation , Sports , Early Access
Developer: Nathan Dearth
Publisher: Nathan Dearth
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game

Tricky Madness is an upcoming arcade snowboarding game with a focus on speed and big air inspired by classics like SSX and 1080.

Build up boost levels by scoring points while from tricks and grinding. Upon landing, unleash a powerful boost for a limited time based on the level you've built. Frequent tricking is the key to enhancing your speed for a thrilling ride!

Build up your Freaky meter with spins, flips, grabs, and grinds then perform Wicked Tricks and Wicked Grinds to really score big.

The Superman, The Worm, and The Butt Slide Grind are some of the many Wicked Tricks you can unleash as you style on the slopes.

Chain tricks together to score more points based on the number of tricks you performed in a combo. Extra points earned form combos are held in a separate counter and are cashed in when you stop the combo or completely lost if you wipeout, manage this risk-reward element is key to mastering the game.

  • 8 handcrafted levels each with their own hidden surprises and unique experiences

  • A dedicated campaign mode set on an open-world mountain with secrets and collectibles.

  • 8 fully voiced characters with their own backstory, personality and visual style.

  • A voiced in-game DJ commentator hyping you up your moves.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

item.title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR -=Dank Dreams and Goated Memes=- [#wow/11 Like and Subscribe] Poggerz Edition
item.description:
Title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR -=Dank Dreams and Goated Memes=- [#wow/11 Like and Subscribe] Poggerz Edition
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Normal Wholesome Games
Publisher: Normal Wholesome Games
Release Date: Nov 14, 2024




About This Game

The illuminati have stolen all the world’s memes! You’re an ex secret-service agent turned to a peaceful life of painting, but now you’re needed one more time to fight back. lets be real its an FPS game that's a sequel to the original you know exactly what to expect why are u still reading this don't let ur memes be dreams

featuring a state of da art creamy meme slider to adjust ur meme levels to your liking. this took a team of 483 developers 7 years to build making this now a AAAAA game get rekt scrubs

Many gr9 moments:

  • 13 levels of neuron-obliterating fun!

  • High-security prison outbreak where you’ll stop along the way to do some laundry

  • Speed your convertible through zombie-infested streets because yes you’re a badass but you’re also late for work

  • Blow up a helicopter

  • Infiltrate Area 51 to stop a world-threatening event planned by the Illuminati

  • … aliens

  • And more!!!1!!

Headshot with your favs:

  • shitty pistol

  • big D ;)

  • goated shotty (only if ur cool)

  • awwwp uwu

  • rip rocket

  • Throwable spliff aka doobie aka joint aka blunt

  • Gun that shoots farts (becuz f*** it why not)

  • AND MORE!!!!

420BLAZEIT 2 features a healthy amount of IMAGINARY “consumables” that grant you cool powers so you can truly 420 BLAZE IT 360 NO SCOPE IT like an EPICC GAMER(™). 13 levels x 27 weapons x sherk + dhomas the dank engine = 420% BIGGER AND BETTER than the original!!1!

“This game changed my entire life before it i had a respectable job and family now im a leet gamer gettin 480 headshoots no scope blaze it every day. 10/10” - this could be u!!!

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

420BLAZEIT 2 contains violence and drug usage. It’s not appropriate for young audiences.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i5-4670 / AMD FX4350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce GT1030 / Radeon RX550
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 16 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 720p Low-Med Settings, Producing 40+ FPS
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD 2700x
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce 2060 / Radeon RX5700
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 16 GB available space

item.title: Epic Auto Towers
item.description:
Title: Epic Auto Towers
Genre: Casual , Indie , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Aleksandr Golovkin
Publisher: Aleksandr Golovkin
Release Date: Nov 14, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 14, 2024




About This Game

Epic Auto Towers is a single-player turn-based strategy game combining elements of autobattler, deckbuilder and roguelike. Purchase uncommon and rare Towers and build the strongest combo to withstand the monster assault! Discover unusual Tower combinations as you come back for more.

PICK YOUR STRATEGY


In Epic Auto Towers you buy, drag and drop your Towers on the field from the Tower Store. The field has limited room, so your choice of Towers matters, as does Tower placement. For example, a Cat Tower gets bonuses from milk, so it makes sense to put it next to a Milk Tower.

CONSTANT UPGRADES


All Towers destroyed during battle are fully restored next round, keeping all received bonuses. Don’t hesitate to invest in Tower upgrades, they stay forever!

STACK TOWERS


Combine Towers of the same type to stack them higher. Taller Towers have improved stats and stronger unique abilities!

AUTOMATIC BATTLES


Press “End Turn” and watch the Towers vs. monsters battle unfold. Did you prepare well?

Game features:

  • Common, uncommon and rare towers, each with their unique abilities!
  • Unique-looking Towers: Cat Towers, Frog Towers, TNT Towers, etc.
  • Build your economy: certain Towers, like the Chest Tower, give you gold each turn. Strike a balance between economy and battle Towers.
  • Beautiful 2D graphics, fun-looking Towers, monsters and bosses!
  • Epic synergies: Tower combinations, placement, and Relics all come together.
  • Random generation: Random Towers are added to the Tower Store each turn. Adapt your strategy around what you can buy here and now, or take the risk and wait for the Tower you want! Either way, no two runs will be the same!

item.title: Sorry We're Closed
item.description:
Title: Sorry We're Closed
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: à la mode games
Publisher: Akupara Games
Release Date: Nov 14, 2024




About This Game

Sorry We're Closed is a nostalgic, single-player survival horror game. Enjoy atmospheric environments driven by classic fixed camera angles and the thrill of arcade-style first person combat. Enter the perilous demon world, collecting items and managing your resources to stay alive.

A WORLD OF ANGELS AND DEMONS

Follow the final days of Michelle as she battles to break the curse placed on her by a powerful demon looking for love. Help (or hinder!) the lives of curious residents in Michelle’s bustling London borough as you pursue freedom from your own untimely demise.

A BLESSING OR A CURSE?

With multiple endings to discover, influence your fate as the choices you make will open new opportunities to avoid or embrace the antagonist’s allure.

SURVIVAL HORROR WITH A TWIST

Taunted with a few days of freedom left, Michelle is offered tantalising opportunities to escape her curse. If she can muster her courage, brave the demon world, and keep her Hellhound pistol loaded, she might find a way to rebalance the scales of destiny.

Explore with nostalgic fixed camera angles as you delve deeper into the liminal cracks that separate consciousness and sleep. Defend with arcade-style combat in first person using demonic weapons.

SNAP YOUR FINGERS AND OPEN YOUR THIRD EYE...

Michelle gains the power of the Third Eye, allowing her to peer between worlds and learn about the hidden denizens in her neighbourhood.

Open your Third Eye to stun enemies and reveal their weakpoints.

Peel away the boundaries of the worlds to uncover secrets and solve puzzles.

    • Storage: 2 GB available space
